sound_mind.title: Declaration of Sound Mind
sound_mind.content: By signing, I confirm that I am of sound mind, capable of making my own decisions, and in good physical and mental health. I understand the nature and effect of creating and executing a will, and I have the capacity to do so at this time. I agree and understand that monitoring my own health and capabilities is my own responsibility, and in the event I fall ill will inform Herit as soon as possible.

no_duress.title: Declaration of No Duress
no_duress.content: By signing, I confirm that I am acting entirely of my own free will, without any threat, pressure, coercion, or undue influence from any other person. I choose to use this platform voluntarily and without reservation.

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
